title: Solar Lamps for Rural Areas
description: Providing affordable solar-powered lamps to improve education and safety in rural areas of Bangladesh.

title: Save Sundarbans Tigers
description: Raising awareness and funds for protecting the endangered Royal Bengal Tigers in the Sundarbans.

title: Flood Relief for Char Areas
description: Supporting flood-affected families in char areas with food, medicine, and shelter.

title: Handicrafts for Women Empowerment
description: Empowering women through training and selling handmade crafts to improve livelihoods in rural Bangladesh.

title: E-Learning Platform for Students
description: Launching an affordable e-learning platform to help Bangladeshi students access quality education online.

title: Clean Water Initiative
description: Bringing clean and safe drinking water to remote villages in Bangladesh through sustainable technology.

title: Recycling Plastic Waste
description: Establishing a startup focused on recycling plastic waste and creating eco-friendly products in Bangladesh.
